claim: A video in Bolivia of a man being loaded into an ambulance claims this is a “false death.”
label: MISLEADING

claim: The truck depicting the god of death Anubis is aimed at testing and then infecting people, which eventually ends with human microchipping.
label: FALSE

claim: FB post claims that the group of 300+ COVID-19 patients under severe condition in a clinical trial recovered after receiving western medicine alongside Chinese medicine; as a contrast, the group which receives only western medicine, including Quinine , has 100+ death toll.
label: No evidence

claim: A COVID-19 victim raises an arm after death
label: MISLEADING

claim: A video stating that in Brazil hospitals receive €3.000 for each Covid-19-related death.
label: FALSE

claim: Cuba’s low number of COVID-19 deaths is due to its use of hydroxychloroquine to treat patients
label: FALSE

claim: Data show the pandemic is losing its strength and that number of deaths is declining.
label: Misleading

claim: Pandemic is the most massive fraud in the US. People who die supposedly due to COVID-19, in reality, have other causes of death.
label: FALSE

claim: A Facebook video claims that a new oral spray “deactivates 98% of the coronavirus” in the mouth. This effect is believed to be partly due to the ability of trypsin to sever proteins on the surface of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
label: No evidence

claim: Viral pictures show organ trafficking of COVID-19 patients dead bodies.
label: FALSE

claim: According to the Brazilian Civil Registry, there were more deaths in 2019 than in 2020, considering the first semester only.
label: FALSE

claim: A mobile COVID-19 testing station bears a logo that depicts an ancient deity of death.
label: FALSE

claim: Brazil recorded more deaths in the first half of 2019 than in the first half of 2020.
label: FALSE

claim: In the US tenthousands of death cases may have been falsely attributed to Covid-19
label: No evidence

claim: A post shared more than a thousand times on Facebook claims that a corpse of a COVID-19 positive person is 100 times more “toxic” 72 hours after death — and that because undertakers are not burying bodies within this prescribed period, funerals have become hotspots for further infections.
label: FALSE
